MSMPanel

Panel that contains MapStoreManager grid.

Inherits from

  • <Ext.Panel>
Summary
MSMPanelPanel that contains MapStoreManager grid.
Properties
id{string} id of extPanel
config{object} object for configuring the component.
border{boolean} If set to true, a border is drawn.
title{string} add a title to a panel.
iconCls{string} class associated to icon
layout{string} sets the type of layout
lang{string} sets application locale
langSelector{object} combo to select a locale parameter
Functions
initComponentInitializes the component

Properties

id

{string} id of extPanel

{object} object for configuring the component.  See config.js

{boolean} If set to true, a border is drawn.

{string} add a title to a panel.

iconCls

{string} class associated to icon

layout

{string} sets the type of layout

lang

{string} sets application locale

{object} combo to select a locale parameter
